description:
Repro:
 * Running nova-cert (essex release)
 * take down RabbitMQ for 2 minutes
 * restart RabbitMQ
 * nova-cert ceases to respond, does not auto reconnect to RabbitMQ queues to process requests
title: nova-cert process doesn't auto reconnect to rabbitmq
